verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Ephraim \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* Gideon, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* fail \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*?” \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* violently.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* Gideon answered \w them|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H6213"\w* compared \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Are|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w gleanings|strong="H5955"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* Ephraim \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w grape|strong="H1210"\w* \w harvest|strong="H1210"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* Abiezer?

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Oreb|strong="H6159"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zeeb|strong="H2062"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H6213"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* compared \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*?” \w When|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w anger|strong="H7307"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w subsided|strong="H7503"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w his|strong="H5674"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* men \w came|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w exhausted|strong="H5889"\w* \w yet|strong="H5889"\w* still \w in|strong="H5674"\w* \w pursuit|strong="H7291"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* Gideon said \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w some|strong="H1992"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w exhausted|strong="H5889"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w still|strong="H5971"\w* \w pursuing|strong="H7291"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w* asked, “\w Are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w already|strong="H6258"\w* \w in|strong="H6635"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w possession|strong="H3027"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*?”

“\w Very|strong="H3651"\w* \w well|strong="H3651"\w*,” \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* replied, “\w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w tear|strong="H1758"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w briers|strong="H1303"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*!”

\w From|strong="H5927"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w* \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w same|strong="H2063"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*, \w but|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* men \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w* \w gave|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w same|strong="H2063"\w* \w response|strong="H6030"\w* \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* men \w of|strong="H1696"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* Gideon told \w the|strong="H7725"\w* men \w of|strong="H4026"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w*, “\w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* triumph, \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w tear|strong="H5422"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w*!”

Now \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Karkor|strong="H7174"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w about|strong="H3605"\w* \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H1121"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w armies|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* thousand \w swordsmen|strong="H8025"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* already \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1870"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* caravan \w route|strong="H1870"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Nobah|strong="H5025"\w* \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w Jogbehah|strong="H3011"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w he|strong="H5221"\w* \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*, taking \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* surprise.

\w When|strong="H5127"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, Gideon \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, routing \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w After|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w*, \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* along \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Ascent|strong="H4608"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Heres.

There \w he|strong="H2205"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* interrogated \w him|strong="H7592"\w*. \w The|strong="H3920"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w for|strong="H7592"\w* \w him|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* names \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w seventy-seven|strong="H7657"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H5288"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Gideon \w went|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* men \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* said, “\w Here|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, \w about|strong="H2009"\w* \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w taunted|strong="H2778"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, saying, ‘\w Are|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* \w already|strong="H6258"\w* \w in|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w possession|strong="H3027"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w weary|strong="H3286"\w* men?’”

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H5892"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* using \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w briers|strong="H1303"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w he|strong="H5892"\w* \w disciplined|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5892"\w* also \w pulled|strong="H5422"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Penuel|strong="H6439"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* men \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Next, Gideon asked \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, “What kind \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* did \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w Tabor|strong="H8396"\w*?” “\w Men|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w*,” \w they|strong="H4428"\w* answered, “each \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w resembling|strong="H8389"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

“\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*,” Gideon replied, “\w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* mother! \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w if|strong="H3863"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jether|strong="H3500"\w*, \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, “\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w them|strong="H2026"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w draw|strong="H8025"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w fearful|strong="H3372"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w youth|strong="H5288"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w* said, “\w Get|strong="H3947"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* yourself, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* man \w is|strong="H3588"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w Zebah|strong="H2078"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w Zalmunna|strong="H6759"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w crescent|strong="H7720"\w* \w ornaments|strong="H7720"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w necks|strong="H6677"\w* \w of|strong="H6677"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w*, “\w Rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*—\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandson|strong="H1121"\w*—\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Gideon|strong="H1439"\w* replied, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w added|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w request|strong="H7596"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w earring|strong="H5141"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w plunder|strong="H7998"\w*.” (\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* enemies \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w Ishmaelites|strong="H3459"\w*.)
